name: bowel

the long tube that carries solid waste from the stomach out of the body: He has trouble with his bowels. bowel cancer/cancer of the bowel move your bowels
(said especially by doctors and nurses) to excrete (= pass from the body) the solid waste that is contained in the bowels: The patient had complained of general abdominal pain and difficulty moving her bowels for the past four days.
